text: The Philippine Basketball Association season scoring leaders are the season by season individual scoring leaders of the Philippine Basketball Association (PBA). It originally started during the 1997 season, but it became an official award when the PBA Awards Press Corps started its official recognition of the award during the 2011–12 season.
